Fizesd be számlád egyszerűen! Rázd újból a piros borítékot a JóDolgok meglepetéseiért!
- Könnyebb és izgalmasabb játék a JóDolgok meglepetéseiért  
- Egyszerűsítés a fizetési folyamatban  
- Hibajavítások 

Pay your bills easily! Shake the red envelope again for GoodThings surprises!
- More convenient and exciting way to play for GoodThings surprises  
- Ease in payment process  
- Bugfixes

Check your TUTI+ balance, and talk freely above 300 HUF until midnight. Take a look at your Vodafone Family savings.
On the Dashboard, you can already check the EU international voice and SMS bundled in your tariffs.
 
- TUTI+ tariff
- Vodafone Family monthly fee discount display
- International tariff
- Minor bugfixes

Check your TUTI+ balance, and talk freely above 300 HUF until midnight. Take a look at your Vodafone Family savings.
On the Dashboard, you can already check the EU international voice and SMS bundled in your tariffs.
 
- TUTI+ tariff
- Vodafone Family monthly fee discount display
- International tariff
- Minor bugfixes
From now you can renew your contract and go postpaid easily with My Vodafone application.
From now you can renew your contract and go postpaid easily with My Vodafone application.
Use our well-known services in My Vodafone App with a whole new user experience. You can pay your bill, top-up and purchase data more easily in our renewed application.
Use our well-known services in My Vodafone App with a whole new user experience. You can pay your bill, top-up and purchase data more easily in our renewed application.

Handle all your mobile numbers at one place!
You can log in with e-mail address and share access to your account and set the permission levels.

Handle all your mobile numbers at one place!
You can log in with e-mail address and share access to your account and set the permission levels.
